body.name: Chicco NextFit Max ClearTex Convertible Car Seat| Rear-Facing Seat for Infants 12-40 lbs. | Forward-Facing Toddler Car Seat 25-65 lbs. | Baby Travel Gear | Cove/Grey
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 22 hrs 34 mins
features: BUILT TO GROW — NextFit Max ClearTex offers 25% more legroom compared to other NextFit car seats and a 50 lb. weight limit maximizes time in rear-facing position; forward-facing mode accommodates older children (up to 65 lbs.) with more calf support.
NO ADDED CHEMICALS — From textiles to tags, gentle ClearTex fabric features no added chemicals; GREENGUARD Gold Certified for low chemical emissions contributes to healthier air quality around baby.
EASIEST TO INSTALL CORRECTLY — Designed to deliver a secure install with premium LATCH connectors, SuperCinch force-multiplying tightener, RideRightTM bubbles levels and a 9-position leveling system.

HEAD AND TORSO PROTECTION — Superior DuoGuard with deep rigid shell for head and body support, EPS energy-absorbing foam and steel-reinforced frame offer reassuring protection. A padded no-rethread 5-point harness accommodates infant, toddler and beyond.
SMOOTH TRANSITIONS — Convertible car seat easily transitions from vehicle to vehicle or between modes due to premium LATCH connectors with click-on attachment and push-button release.
body.description: Extended Rear-Facing UseThe NextFit Max ClearTex Extended-Use Chicco convertible car seat offers 25% more legroom compared to other Chicco NextFit car seats and a 50 lb. weight limit to comfortably maximize time in the rear-facing position.Offering a seamless transition, the NextFit Max ClearTex provides more calf support in forward-facing mode and a 65 lb. weight limit. A 9-position, Easy-Extend Headrest System raises with the harness to effortlessly accommodate growth throughout both modes and a removable newborn positioner, creates an infant car seat with head support for infants weighing 4-11 lbs.ClearTex FabricsFrom textiles to tags, ClearTex features no added chemicals for gentle child comfort and parent peace of mind. GREENGUARD Gold Certified, the NextFit Max ClearTex has been tested for low chemical emissions, contributing to healthier air quality around baby.Easiest To Install CorrectlyThe NextFit Max ClearTex is designed with smart functionality that makes it the easiest to install correctly, every time. Dual RideRight bubble levels and a nine-position ReclineSure leveling system help verify and achieve proper angle in the vehicle seat. Premium connectors, a SuperCinch force-multiplying tightener and the LockSure belt-tightening system provide a secure install via LATCH or the vehicle seat belt, creating an ideal travel car seat.Premium ProtectionDuoGuard features a deep rigid shell and EPS energy-absorbing foam that surround the head and torso for head and body support. Seat shell is reinforced with a steel frame for superior impact protection.For everyday use and cleanup, this Chicco car seat features a padded, machine-washable seat pad and a space-saving, dishwasher-safe CupFolder.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very well made
reviews.reviewText: We have this for our granddaughter and it is quite nice.Well designed, easily adjustable, comfortable. There are quite a few stickers on the outer sides, that give very helpful directions for various features. Recommend highly...nothing negative about this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Safe, comfortable, and extremely easy
reviews.reviewText: I love this car seat. It is super easy to install with the supercinch system. It takes less than 5 minutes to get an excellent and safe installation. The seat itself seems really comfortable and most importantly really sturdy. I like the high sides and the protection they seem to offer. Despite the high sides and having a small vehicle, I have had no issues getting an almost 2 year old in rear facing.The zip cover makes it really easy to clean, which is really nice. This seat is really well made and feels to be of very high quality. I feel that it is much sturdier than graco seats but easier to use and clean than Britax seats. It is easy to loosen, tighten, and to get a good fit. The headrest is easily adjustable for proper harness height which is a lifesaver if you ever need to use it for another child. It reclines very easily as well.Overall this seat is very safe and very easy to use. It appears comfortable and would be a great seat for anyone who wants convenience, safety, and comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This carseat is great quality! Very padded & comfy for the baby. The color is nice. It's very easy to use & switch vehicles if need be. Only complaint would be I wish the cover would zip off so it could be washed. Other than that I have no issues. I 100% recommend this carseat

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So Easy to Install!
reviews.reviewText: Super easy to install (in 2021 RAV4)! The latch system is exponentially easier than Graco. The sides are quite high which makes it a little difficult to put the child in if your short, but it seems much more safe, sturdy, and let’s not forget about easy to clean! Doesn’t leave bruises like our old Graco E2F! The belts glide so easily when tightening everything. This is a miracle seat, I swear! It also has a little compartment in the back to store the user manual. That’s so nice! I can’t recommend this enough!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super comfortable and easy to install!!
reviews.reviewText: When my son outgrew his Britax infant seat I did hours of research and finally settled on the Graco Extend2fit based on its great reviews and moderate price. I absolutely hated it, and my son would scream the entire time he was strapped in it. I could never seem to get a good fit in either the seat itself or for my 1 year-old, 22 lb son.Next I tried the Britax Boulevard ClickTight with ARB. I have always exclusively used Britax car seats with my other children and had high hopes for this one. My car has second row bucket seats and this particular seat is HUGE! Once again, I could not get this seat to fit appropriately and unfortunately had to return it.I continued my search and for some reason this Chicco seat doesn’t come up on many “safest or best convertible car seat” lists but does get great reviews on Consumer Reports so I decided to give it a try. I could tell at once this seat would be different-it just looked super comfortable and my son did not fuss or cry when I put him in to try it. I then went to install it and this was the only seat I could install by myself and let me tell you it is rock solid—the installation of this car seat is amazingly simple and it really does take a quick pull of each latch strap. I did have to use a foam child seat positioner to get adequate recline, but the fit is perfect now!! Fits great in my bucket seats and my son loves it!!! Also seems to be one of the safest so I could not be more pleased with this purchase!!! Thank-you Chicco and Amazon!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best purchase I’ve made.
reviews.reviewText: Started out with the Chicco KeyFit 30 and loved it. My sister (also using the KeyFit 30) was unfortunately recently in a serious accident with her 8 month old in the car and her KeyFit didn’t even budge during the incident. My precious nephew had not a scratch, bruise or pain to speak of. So we are indebted to the company and loyal to the Chicco brand. Rated to 30 lbs or 30 inches, our super tall kiddo out grew the KeyFit 10 lbs early! So we upgraded to the Nextfit Zip Max and I can’t brag about this seat enough. Not only does it look really sharp and offer some seriously great comfort features (like the premium cushiony materials, shoulder pads and buckle pad), but it is one of the most secure-fitting seats i’ve ever seen. There is almost no movement at all, whether you’re testing from the belt path or the seat top (which is generally not recommended due to the natural movement that can be expected, as physics goes). Even compared to the KeyFit, the install is very secure. I love the leg room this seat boasts (and so does she). And the reclining feature (which wasn’t really a selling point to me initially) is a real life saver! I adjusted it too far upright, her head tipped forward when she slept and even short trips were a nightmare. After a simple adjustment (in the gas station parking lot because I couldn’t take it anymore), I found the magic number and Lights Out! Now all trips are a breeze! Thus far, we are only using it in rear facing mode so I can’t speak to the convertibility, but we are loving the comfort, flexibility and most of all SAFETY this seat provides! It’s expensive but worth every penny!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good but hard to buckle
reviews.reviewText: Couldn’t figure out how to move the buckle between legs for an easier way to buckle. Kind of tight there and doesn’t fit well through the second hole. Otherwise, great car seat, easy to install, easy to tighten once child is buckled

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is the one!
reviews.reviewText: So honestly I haven’t used this yet, but I read through the manual and have gone through and checked out the Carseat and all it’s parts. It’s soft, sturdy and seems comfortable. It appears to be safe and I know it will be easy to install. I was using a Chicco Keyfit30 infant Carseat and loved it! But my child has graduated. I tried buying a different brand and ended up returning it when I was able to snag this NEXTFIT on sale for 199 which is way better than 319. It’s a shame car seats cost so much when you are working with a tight budget. But it’s worth it for peace of mind and should last many years. If you’re stuck trying to decide what car seat I would recommend this one. I’m very happy with this purchase!
muy buena silla con muchas funciones y adaptable a las necesidades

reviews.reviewTitle: Se ve súper segura para el bebé, con suficientes puntos de apoyo para su sujeción para el bebé
reviews.reviewText: La silla se ve muy cómoda para mi bebé, además de que es muy fácil montarla en el auto. Eso si es bastante voluminosa en un auto pequeño cabe a duras penas pero no servirá si El Niño ya va hacia el frente, en una SUV sin problema cabe.

A mi bebé le encantó, va muy a gusto, llora mucho menos que cuando iba en dirección opuesta. Lo veo muy cómodo. El único detalle es que el color es increíble pero cualquier mancha se nota más que si fuese negro por ejemplo
Una maravilla, súper cómoda, excelente calidad, segura, mi bebé puede dormir cómodamente por las múltiples posiciones que tiene, súper recomendada.
Good car seat. A bit big but just nice for my Honda Freed 2020 model.
